body: One of my favourites from the artist. Too bad there's no English translation. Good thing I can read Chinese. Basically, Ayaka, the girl, uploaded a nude photo of herself online and was caught by her brother, who presumably blackmailed her into letting him finger her every day. In the first few pages, he fingers her but leaves for work, telling her to figure it out on her own. She thinks there's no way she can do it. 3 months later, she's still trying to masturbate but has never managed to cum. Her brother comes back from work early and realizes what she was trying to do. He eats her out and proceeds to fuck her. He takes a photograph of her creampie and wonders how the people who saw her nude selfie would think of it. Heh, I should probably translate this one myself but I'm too lazy to. Not sure if I'd want my first translation to be a lolicon, either...but at this point, why do I even worry?
